title: Enable or disable the ad authorization setting for a TikTok post

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok post. To obtain the public posts of a TikTok account, use /business/video/list/ . Example: 7123456789123456789 .

parameters.name: is_ad_promotable
parameters.description: Whether to enable the "Ad authorization" setting to allow the post to be promoted. Supported values: true : To enable the "Ad authorization" setting. false : To disable the "Ad authorization" setting. Note : If the TikTok post is being used in Spark Ads, you cannot disable the "Ad authorization" setting for the post.

parameters.name: authorization_days
parameters.description: The authorization validity period in days. Supported values: 7 , 30 , 60 , 180 , 365 . Default value: 30 .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: Returned only when is_ad_promotable is set to true in the request. The ID of the TikTok post. Example: 7123456789123456789 .

fields.name: auth_code
fields.description: Returned only when is_ad_promotable is set to true in the request. The authorization code for the TikTok post. Example: #1Ea2bcde3fUM/ghijEk/L4mOceft5deFRq6za7JsgnAJ8PB9n1XIr1rC1b/5Rw4= .

fields.name: auth_code_start_time
fields.description: Returned only when is_ad_promotable is set to true in the request. The time when the authorization code becomes valid, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: auth_code_end_time
fields.description: Returned only when is_ad_promotable is set to true in the request. The time when the authorization code expires, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: authorization_days
fields.description: Returned only when is_ad_promotable is set to true in the request. The authorization validity period in days. Supported values: 7 , 30 , 60 , 180 , 365 .
